alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lake County through 530 PM EDT... At 459 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Howey-In-the-hills, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tavares, Groveland, Mascotte, Howey-In-the-hills and Lake Harris. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County
